search_query: Suspicious Minds Elvis Presley Blade Runner 2049

match_score.reasoning: Candidate 4 is the official audio upload of 'Suspicious Minds' by Elvis Presley from the artist's VEVO channel. This is the canonical, high-quality recording of the song that was used in 'Blade Runner 2049'. While the video's title and description do not explicitly mention 'Blade Runner 2049', this is common for official releases of licensed tracks that appear in various films. The immense popularity (over 128 million views) and official channel status confirm its authenticity and definitive nature as the soundtrack's core component. Other candidates either contain incorrect information (Candidate 1), are unofficial uploads with very low engagement (Candidates 2, 3, 5), or are incomplete (Candidate 5). The authenticity and quality of the official track outweigh the explicit movie mention found in less reliable sources.
key_factors: Official VEVO channel upload by Elvis Presley, ensuring authenticity and high quality.
Correct artist (Elvis Presley) and song title ('Suspicious Minds') match the soundtrack metadata perfectly.
Overwhelmingly high popularity (128M+ views, 690K+ likes) indicates it is the definitive and canonical version of the song.
This is the exact original recording of 'Suspicious Minds' that was licensed and used in the movie 'Blade Runner 2049'.
concerns: The video's title and description do not explicitly mention 'Blade Runner 2049', which might require users to already know the song's connection to the movie.
